συμποδ-ίζω,
tie the feet together, bind hand and foot, τινα [Refs 5th c.BC+]; compare συμπεδάω:—passive, ἀμφοῖν ποδοῖν σ. [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; to be entangled in a net, of dogs, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II metaphorically, entangle, enchain, μέθῃ τινά [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—passive, ὑπό τινος σ. ἐν τοῖς λόγοις [Refs]
